titles.title: An original bill making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.
An original bill making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: Committee on Appropriations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mullin. With written report No. 119-38.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 113.
